flawed_nl_solution:
The period the store had the TV was 2009-2001= <<2009-2001=8>>8 years.
The TV decreased by $35/year * 8 years = $<<35*8=208>>208.
So the price in 2009 was $1950 - $208 = $<<1950-208=1742>>1742.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 280, not 208. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
